sense.def:
A project
je obsežen poskus, da bi nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: ...the cancellation of the Blue Streak Missile project.

sense.def:
A project
je tudi dijakova ali študentova podrobno izdelana naloga.

To be projected
pomeni biti načrtovan ali pričakovan.

seg.quote: There were demonstrations against the projected visit.
The population of Calcutta is projected to rise to seventy million people.

sense.def:
To project a film or picture onto a screen or wall
pomeni s projektorjem film ali sliko pokazati na zaslonu ali steni.

seg.quote: The images were projected on a screen.

sense.def:
Način, kako nekdo ali nekaj
is projected
, pove, kako oziroma kot kaj nekaj ali nekoga prikažemo ljudem.

seg.quote: He had projected himself as a reformer.
He could see the end of a spear projecting over the rock.
